title: Social Anxiety Disorder (Social Phobia)
description: A comprehensive guide to Social Anxiety Disorder (Social Phobia), including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Social Anxiety Disorder (Social Phobia) is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Anxiety Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
